title.en: Webhook triggered with any event for each property in JSON object

hint.en:
Will try to parse the HTTP body as a JSON object, and trigger for each property in the object.

Ex: { "hello": 123, "world": 456 } will result in two triggered events where the first will have the property tag set to "hello" and the value tag set to "123".

example.en: The HTTP request headers serialised as json string
The HTTP request query parameters serialised as json string
The HTTP request body as string
JSON object property value as string
